trans-unit.source: The steps in this article create an HDInsight cluster by using basic configuration settings.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this article create an HDInsight cluster by using basic configuration settings.

trans-unit.source: For information about other cluster configuration settings (such as using Azure virtual network or a metastore for Hive and Oozie), see <linkText>Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using custom options</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For information about other cluster configuration settings (such as using Azure virtual network or a metastore for Hive and Oozie), see <linkText>Provision Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using custom options</linkText><title></title>.
